def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Criteria
form = widget.ProviderWidget if (form == None) : return
entity = form.Entity if (entity == None) : return
sql = "SELECT TEMVARIACAO FROM PD_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE = " + entity.Fields["PRODUTO"].Handle.ToString() condicao = Entity.GetFirstOrDefault(EntityDefinition.FromQuery(sql), Criteria.Empty).Fields["TEMVARIACAO"] widget.Hidden = condicao != "S"
